remarks: Limit of the composition of two functions.  If the limit of ` F ` at ` A ` is ` B ` and the limit of ` G ` at ` B ` is ` C ` , then the limit of ` G o. F ` at ` A ` is ` C ` .  With respect to ~ limcco and ~ limccnp , here we drop continuity assumptions.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
limccog.1 $e |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( dom G \ { B } ) ) $.
limccog.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( F limCC A ) ) $.
limccog.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. ( G limCC B ) ) $.
limccog $p |- ( ph -> C e. ( ( G o. F ) limCC A ) ) $.
